testcase.name: FocusableText

failure.message: All text must be accessible by VoiceOver and have an Accessible Name.

testcase.failure:
Learn more about this issue: https://mobile-docs.deque.com/attest/ios/focusable-text.html
Guidelines: WCAG 4.1.2
Properties: isAccessibilityFocusable: false isInFocusableView: false className: UILabel inheritedType: textElement text: Worldspace Attest

testcase.name: SupportsDynamicType

failure.message: Text controls should respond to system requests for Type Size changes.

testcase.failure:
Learn more about this issue: https://mobile-docs.deque.com/attest/ios/supports-dynamic-type.html
Guidelines: Platform Guideline
Properties: overridesTraitCollectionDidChange: false isInTableViewCell: false supportsAutoAdjustment: true className: UILabel inheritedType: textElement text: Worldspace Attest respondsToContentSizeNotification: false adjustsFontForContentSizeCategory: false

testcase.name: ImageViewName

failure.message: ImageViews must either have an Accessible Name or not be VoiceOver-focusable.

testcase.failure:
Learn more about this issue: https://mobile-docs.deque.com/attest/ios/imageview-name.html
Guidelines: WCAG 1.1.1
Properties: isAccessibilityFocusable: true name: null isInFocusableView: false className: UIImageView inheritedType: image

testcase.name: LabelInName

failure.message: Any focusable active controls with visible text should have that exact same visible text in the accessible name (accessibilityLabel).

testcase.failure:
Learn more about this issue: https://mobile-docs.deque.com/attest/ios/label-in-name.html
Guidelines: WCAG 2.5.3
Properties: isActiveControl: true expectedValue: null name: Sasquatch textOfSelfAndDescendants: Menu className: CauldronButton value: null
